description: Stylish, well-appointed townhome in the heart of East Van, just off Nanaimo & 34th. This 3 bed + flex home is part of the beautifully restored Century House collection, blending modern comfort with heritage charm. Family-friendly layout features a full basement media room + versatile flex space ideal for office, gym, or studio. Top-floor primary retreat offers vaulted ceilings, double vanity ensuite & private balcony w/ city & mountain views. Two additional beds provide flexibility for kids, guests or WFH. Street-level access, ample street parking & walkable location near Cunningham Elem, parks, T&T & transit.
